name: edited
description:
Listens on editable elements and calls a provided callback when it
discerns that a significant edit was made.

scripts.manual-test: npm run lint && npm run browserify && intern-runner config=test/intern proxyOnly=true
scripts.selenium-start: if [ -z "$CI" ]; then selenium & echo $! > ./selenium.pid && sleep 1; fi
scripts.selenium-stop: if [ -f selenium.pid ]; then xargs -a selenium.pid pkill -P && rm selenium.pid; fi
scripts.test-browser: npm run selenium-start && intern-runner config=test/intern; EXIT=$?; npm run selenium-stop && exit $EXIT
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run browserify && npm run test-browser

author: Shahar Or (http://github.com/mightyiam)
